description: After a simple recipe for homemade gnocchi? Try your hand at our ricotta gnocchi. Creamy, comforting and bursting with fragrant herbs, it's a winner.
keywords: Gnocchi,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mar 2021,Autumn,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Herb & Ricotta Gnocchi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mixed fresh herb leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place tomatoes, onion, oil and half the herbs in a large baking dish. Season with pepper and toss to coat. Bake for 20 minutes or until onion has softened.

Meanwhile, place ricotta, eggs and remaining herbs in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper, then add flour and gently mix to combine. Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead until just smooth.
Cut dough evenly into 8 portions. Roll each piece into a 2cm-thick log. Using a small knife, cut 2cm pieces from each log.

Cook gnocchi, in 2 batches, in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water for 1 minute or until tender and gnocchi rises to surface. Using a slotted spoon, add to tomato mixture with rocket. Toss gently to combine. Divide among bowls and serve.
